0.0.1.name: wordpress/your-text-manager
0.0.1.description:
NEW! lightbox with your text when the page loading! you can suggest your visitors to like your facebook page, reffer them to some external links or whatever you want.

This plugin alows you to set text or code to display before or after each post, without changing the post content. features:

  • Easy interface and simple settings pages

  • Option to display a text before the content of the post, after the content or before and after the post

  • All features support any type of client-side code: HTML, Javascript, embed of video or enything you want

  • Great plugin for ads: display banner of google adsense on thwe website

  • Display your message to all visitors in a pop-up lightbox. put there a like button, and you will get lots of likes every week

  • Set a message for your authors and they will read it as soon as they will log into your system.

  • Generate your own widget with your custu
